text: @realDonaldTrump Why don't you focus 9n more important things ... you know ... like 125000 CoVid19 deaths and slowing that down, the 21 million unemployed, the tens of millions about to lose healthcare in the middle of a pandemic, bills for kills of US soldiers .... you know???
